name: Bamba
description: Classic peanut butter snack loved by all ages.
Crunchy, sweet, and oddly addictive.
Israeli national treasure in a bag.
Great for movie nights or quick munchies.
No kids' party is complete without it.

name: Bread
description: Freshly baked and still warm inside.
Soft crumb, crisp crust — bakery perfection.
Perfect for sandwiches, toast, or tearing by hand.
Pairs beautifully with butter and jam.
Bread so good, you'll skip the meal and eat this.

name: Doggo
description: Certified good boy, comes with tail wags included.
Loyal, loving, and slightly derpy.
Needs one walk a day and infinite love.
House-trained and full of cuddles.
Will follow you to the ends of the Earth for treats.

name: Entei
description: Legendary Fire Pokémon, not for the faint of heart.
Roars like thunder, runs like a volcano.
Extremely rare and extremely expensive.
Might burn your entire garden by accident.
Officially banned from amateur Pokémon leagues.

name: Slippers
description: Cloud-soft and absurdly comfy.
Perfect for chilly mornings or lazy Sundays.
Stylish enough to wear to your Zoom calls.
Slides on like butter, feels like a hug.
Anti-slip sole to avoid embarrassing hallway incidents.

name: Plane
description: A private jet for your plush or midlife crisis.
Seats 4. Flies like a dream. Taxes like a nightmare.
Because walking is for peasants.
Perfect for billionaires, movie villains, or zoo tycoons.
Fuel not included (neither is a pilot).

name: Messi Shirt
description: Official Messi jersey — wear greatness on your chest.
Made from breathable, goal-scoring fabric.
Boosts your soccer skills by 3% (psychologically).
Dribble through life like a legend.
Perfect gift for any football fan.

name: RefreshingShum
description: No one knows what it is, but it's refreshing!
Fizz meets mystery in a single sip.
Tastes like a clean shower and a weird dream.
Limited edition alien beverage.
May contain hints of mint, lemon... and other planets.

name: Thiccachu
description: Chunky, lovable electric buddy.
Pika-sized power in an XL frame.
Guaranteed to thicc-achu's heart.
Perfect for snuggles and memes.
Sparks joy (and static) wherever it goes.

name: Kuskus
description: Delightfully fluffy North African grain dish.
Great with stews, veggies, or solo.
Pre-steamed and full of cozy vibes.
Faster to cook than rice — and fancier too.
Light, versatile, and surprisingly filling.

name: Jarboa
description: Tiny desert kangaroo-rat with big bounce energy.
Adorable ears, ninja-level hops.
Sleeps all day, parties at night.
Low-maintenance exotic companion.
Cutest thing you'll ever overpay for.

name: Coca-Cola
description: Classic refreshment since forever.
Pairs with every meal (and every emotion).
Open a bottle, spark nostalgia.
Fizz, sugar, and marketing in a bottle.
Cold Coke hits different — you know it's true.

name: Chocolate
description: Rich, melt-in-your-mouth cocoa joy.
Perfect for gifting or hoarding.
Instant mood boost, no prescription needed.
Pairs with wine, coffee, or alone time.
One bite = one step closer to happiness.
